trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected"></xref> and <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"></xref> events of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Adja meg az adatait a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Selected"> </xref> és <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.Deselected"> </xref> események egy <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControl"> </xref> vezérlő.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A> property to determine which event is occurring.
trans-unit.target: Használja a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A>tulajdonság határozza meg, melyik esemény folyamatban van.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.Action%2A>

trans-unit.source: This enables you to handle multiple event types with one event handler.
trans-unit.target: Ez lehetővé teszi, hogy az egy eseménykezelő több esemény kezelésére.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> properties to determine which <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A>és a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A>Tulajdonságok határozza meg, mely <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage>az esemény folyamatban van a tartalmát.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabPage> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPageIndex%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage%2A>

trans-unit.source: For more information about handling events, see [Events](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: Események kezelésére vonatkozó további információkért lásd: [események](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Egy új példányát inicializálja a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs"> </xref> osztály.

trans-unit.source: The property values of the newly created instance are initialized to the specified parameter values.
trans-unit.target: Az újonnan létrehozott példányának tulajdonságértéket vannak inicializálása a megadott paraméterek értékeit.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> az esemény a folyamatban van.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of `tabPage` in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét `tabPage` a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> gyűjtemény.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating which event is occurring.
Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: Lekérdezi a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> az esemény a folyamatban van.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"></xref> the event is occurring for.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.TabPage"> </xref> az esemény a folyamatban van.

trans-unit.source: Gets the zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét lekérdezi a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> gyűjtemény.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*> in the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> collection.
trans-unit.target: A nulla alapú indexét a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>a a <xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControl.TabPages%2A?displayProperty=fullName> gyűjtemény.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.TabControlEventArgs.TabPage*>
